Super gorgeous and the price was especially awesome.

评论概述: LOVE IT! LOVE IT! LOVE IT!

It sparkles and shines and doesn't look fake. Within 5 minutes of posting on Facebook I got over a dozen likes. UPDATE: I have had this ring for over a month and it is still just as beautiful. I get compliments everywhere I go. UPDATE: I've now had this ring for almost a year, still love it. No stones have fallen out, it cleans up nice with dishwashing liquid and soft bristle brush. No tarnishing or scratches. In my opinion it's a great ring.

评论详情: She loved it.  She wears it when she does not want to take the real ring on trips.  It works perfect!

The ring is stunning, which I wasn't expecting. The band is about medium size on the underneath and it sparkles nicely in every lighting. The size was perfect, the color is great and the look on my girlfriends face was perfect. The sterling silver makes it so she can go about her daily life without the risk of it breaking or turning. It is simple and vintage looking which she loves, with the touch of flash and sophistication that I love.
I bought this ring as an anniversary gift for my girlfriend and she loooveeed it. exactly what we both wanted.

I was looking for a stand-in ring for when my ring is being cleaned or when I'm traveling, and this was the closest I could find to my own engagement ring.  Looks nice, but the pave scrapes against the sides of my finger, so it's not the most comfortable to wear longer than a few days.  My coworkers did notice it and said it looked shiny.
looks amazing! it is very comfortable, not to big. I bought this as my everyday ring so my wedding ring doesn't get damaged.

This ring is absolutely beautiful.  The band itself has substantial width, which is very important to me. It sparkles significantly in all quality of light, but it absolutely dazzles in the sunlight.  I was concerned that the stone itself would be too large to look real, but the way it's cut and the way that it is set makes it look like a real vintage style diamond ring. This ring is tasteful, but it is not too delicate or dainty(if that is what you are looking for).  It definitely has some heft to it. The sterling silver band has allowed me to get it wet repeatedly, and has not irritated my skin. I have had it for weeks, and the integrity of the ring has not diminished. For under 50 dollars, you just cannot beat the quality of this ring.  I recommend.

I was really pleased with this ring. Even tho the cubics are small, together they really put a nice spin on it. I would recommend this as a small gift in combo with something else; maybe a pair of earrings. At least that is what I did and I have not regretted it yet!
It is beautiful!  I love it. It was even better than the picture shows. The setting is a realistic size. I get compliments on it just about every day.

my fiance loves it. its a simple yet elegant ring that she will be proud to wear on her finger. afforable as well. u don't need a expensive ring to show her you love her. if she really loves you, she will accept it and cherish it.
Loved the ring! The sizing was just right and the ring was beautiful. It also came on time! I highly recommend this company!

When I received  the ring it was missing a stone and the ring itself was very dull, cheap, and sad looking, not like the picture at all. I was really disappointed, so I sent it back and picked out a different one.

I love the ring itself and my loved one loved it. The only thing wrong was I got the wrong size and bling.com does not have the right size so I can exchange it and we have not found one there we want to replace it with. It was perfect except the size just to bad that bling.com is not carrying the correct size I need to exchange it to.

This ring may be pretty cheap, but it's absolutely beautiful! My fiance got me a much more expensive ring, but the stone needed to be set in it and we weren't going to get it back for about a month. I was itching to have something on my finger though, so I got this one. I like it so much I think I'll wear it pretty often even after we get the more expensive one back. It's also nice to have one that you don't have to worry about messing up, and it's small enough to not get in the way, which is another reason I might keep wearing it pretty often. Excellent deal!

Ring was not what I expected.  The band was very thin and the center stone was set lower than it appeared on the picture.  The stones on the band looked like they would fall out easily.  I returned the ring.
The ring came within days even though I didn't get 2 day delivery. It is very pretty if a little bit bigger that I pictured in my head (my problem not a problem with the product or description).
This is the best ring I have bought for my wife. She loved it and I couldn't ask for anything better.
The ring was gorgeous and met expectations. However, the sizing seems to be a bit large. Would try a smaller size than you normally wear.

This was a great and very inexpensive product. Many thought the ring was double and even triple the price in which I got it for. Definitely worth a buy(although the ring box that came with it was a little "cheap" looking/feeling).

I recieved this for Valentines Day as a promise ring and for the price I was knocked off my feet. It is stunning and very shiny(which is the one aspect I look for, whether it's real or not). I just love how it catches the light. It is delicate and the perfect size for my ring finger. Since I started wearing this I have gotten many compliments on it. Would reccomend if your looking for an inexpensive, gorgeous ring!

I bought this to surprise my girl with a proposal, so she could pick her real ring and I wouldn't be out a ton of dough.  I was very excited to get it, and it showed up ahead of schedule.  Awesome, thanks! The quality of the ring is excellent.  I had to tell her that it was a CZ.  She loves the ring so much, she wants the real one to be custom made to incorporate some of these elements.  She plans to keep it to wear when she is working.  Definitely happy with the purchase!

デザインが凝ってて素敵です。できれば中心になる石を大きめにデザインした方が指輪の凝ったデザインに比例すると思います。
ほどよい大きさのセンター石がきれいなカットで輝き、バランス重視の調和のとれたシェイプで非常に高級なリングに見えます。ややリングの内側のエッジが皮膚に鋭い感触を与え高級感を損ないますが、見た目はきれいで、小ぶりなダイヤのリングと一緒に同じ手に着けることでこのリングがより生きてきます。トラベルジュエリーとしておすすめします。

L'ho preso più per sfizio che per necessità perchè mi piaceva molto il modello. Avevo letto in un'altra recensione che lungo la fascia i brillantini non erano presenti: invece ci sono ed insieme allo zircone centrale fanno un bellissimo effetto! Lo spessore dell'argento è molto esiguo, l'anello è molto leggero ma è comunque ben realizzato.
Reçu sous 1 semaine, jolie bague, bonne taille (j'avais le choix entre plusieurs), j'espère que l'argent est de bonne qualité, a voir dans le temps..
